title: ASKMEAI
author: ASKMEAI
content: AskmeAI is a comprehensive project scanning platform powered by artificial intelligence, and it is fully community-oriented.AskMeAI is a revolutionary blockchain-powered platform that harnesses the capabilities of artificial intelligence (AI) to offer detailed and precise insights into the realm of cryptocurrency.AskmeAI is an artificial intelligence-supported scoring platform, a listing platform where projects scanned using artificial intelligence are showcased, a 90-day staking platform for early-stage users, and a comprehensive structure guided by the ‘clean crypto’ motto, which conducts thorough and holistic evaluations of projects considering every factor.Askmeai was born to address one of crypto’s most significant problems, a problem that the crypto industry created for itself. It has devised a unique solution to this issue, saving time and labor by providing artificial intelligence support.Askmeai enables users to detect ulterior motives behind projects even before they commence. It aims to prevent fraud among individuals with low crypto literacy who may be vulnerable to scams.Why is AskmeAI Project Unique?AskmeAI Project distinguishes itself from other initiatives in several significant ways, showcasing its unique approach and value proposition.Real AI TechnologyCommunityTransparent Scoring SystemHodlersFull ReviewAnti-ScamFeatures1. AskmeAI UsageIt would be useful to examine the usage area and benefits of ASKMEAI under two headings as projects and potential investors.2. Current Problems and SolutionsNumerous projects assert to provide solutions for non-existent problems, but the issues and solutions identified by ASKMEAI are notably realistic.3. AskmeAI Revenue Model and Business Model & Market StrategiesAskmeai has an alternative income source model and the pie slice size of this alternative income source is quite large.Tokenomics:AskmeAI total supply is 22,000,000 on BSC networkAskmeAI total supply is 22,000,000 on the ETH networkAskmeAI Total Total Supply 44,000,000 on BSC+ETH networkToken Name: AskMeAiToken Ticker: $ASKMEMAX TOTAL SUPPLY:44,000,000TOTAL SUPPLY :22,000,00050% BURNEDPartners:Psalms CapitalBounty DetectiveEtc.Website: https://askmeaiproject.com/Twitter: https://x.com/AiAskmeTelegram: https://t.me/askmeportalYoutube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCVD8t0Cgm9EmPtOIVD8-9TAWhitepaper: https://whitepaper.askmeaiproject.com/Tokenomics: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1eP8DXSh1HjXtfjyQOu-jalu4LlAcaQQ-RLPdIzrSUrc/edit?usp=sharing

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: I have gone through your website it looks pretty cool and conveying information but, i doubt there were lots of artificial intelligence that was launched then with all manner of promises to be the top 10 cryptocurrency but those mission weren't accomplished as said, well i can't say of this but the project looks presentable maybe those who are altcoin lover may actually look into it. Why not getting a copper member for your project to be able post images here i think this could also help in gaining people's attention to your project.

You can find the details of the project in other links. There is a video about this. We constantly share on our Twitter account. We continue with a 100% success rate. We use artificial intelligence in the most effective way.

comments.author: Saisher
comments.body: You got this all wrong you should post this in the Announcements (Altcoins) I've checked your post history and there is no post in the Announcements (Altcoins) and you should not create multiple threads it will get your account ban and people will think you are engaging in shill marketing.Even if your project is good it will just be ignored here for not doing the right marketing here.

comments.author: serjent05
comments.body: Aside from the early reply ↑↑↑, it would be an attraction if you were able to present your announcement with graphical aid.  You can buy a copper member in order to post an image, and you can use your site image template for the announcement.  I think it will look good.With regards to the project, I have not read the whitepaper yet but I would like to ask, aside from being under a blockchain project, what is the difference between openai or bard from your Ask Me Ai?  Why would I use your application rather than using the existing chatbot?

comments.author: Mpamaegbu
comments.body: Quote from: Saisher on September 23, 2023, 11:13:02 PMEven if your project is good it will just be ignored here for not doing the right marketing here.I think it's not a good strategy for new projects running their adverts by themselves here. It often comes with a lot of backlashes. Sometimes, we don't want to blame this community for favouring such unsavoury responses towards projects beginning that way. I guess it comes from bad experiences we've had to deal with in the past. Getting a reputable manager to run such would save face. However, most of these new projects don't like paying for such services and that's simply because they know before hand they're going to scam. I'm not saying the project OP is advertising is a scam. I ain't saying it isn't also. I'm just stating a fact.
